name: notes
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.start: npm run build && fastify start -l info dist/app.js
scripts.dev:start: npm run build && fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js
scripts.test: npm run build:ts && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && FASTIFY_AUTOLOAD_TYPESCRIPT=1 node --test --experimental-test-coverage --loader ts-node/esm test/**/*.ts
